Moar Workshop Diary 29/1/2021

What I got up to this week in the workshop.

https://moarguitars.com/

Questions answered this week are;

What do I think about cheap ceramic high gain pickups from Amazon? Why do I use straight headstocks, when some other builders use angled? Does a two piece body have slightly less resonance then a one piece? General pros and cons of each? Whatâ€™s my favourite vibrato system? Why is my workbench so high? What makes a high end guitar high end?
